content:
Gazing at the sea of clouds, something feels peculiar...
It's as if there's something special hidden within,
How mysterious~.
info: 幻雪对海岸的疑惑_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
Although the sea of clouds appears so dreamlike,
I can't help but think that, generally speaking,
this place shouldn't be like this at all...
info: 幻雪对海岸的疑惑_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
Just as I thought, this world is filled with mysterious things,
How fascinating...
info: 幻雪对海岸的疑惑_幻雪流程闲聊1
